creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: in a cream box with tan stripes; wooden box with inscriptions; paper under tie; fabric is mint green with leaf pattern; image of cherry blossom trees in bloom with river in fore ground and mountains in background; four lines of inscription TL
inscription: 梅花笑茅屋　清水繞柴關　春風吹未遍　殘雪山後山 (Plum blossoms smiling around my thatched hut, / Where pure streams wind around my bramble gate— / The spring wind has not blown each one down: / Scattered snowflakes, mountain after mountain!) [Jonathan Chaves]
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #3]; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]; LRC: 蓬莱山下人 {Hōraisan genin}
portfolio: From Landscapes of the Four Seasons
signed: 昭和己巳秋日於吾子知意蕭山軒古人碧翁 {Shōwa tsuchinoto-mi shūjitsu oite %%%%%%% Kojin Hekiō} (Autumn day in 1929, at ?, Kojin Hekiō)
title: Plum Forest Landscape; Spring, from a set of "Landscapes of the Four Seasons"
